articles.title: Seattle Mariners acquire Luis Castillo, send package highlighted by prospect Noelvi Marte to Cincinnati Reds - ESPN
articles.description: The Mariners have acquired star pitcher Luis Castillo from the Reds for minor leaguers Noelvi Marte, Levi Stoudt, Edwin Arroyo and Andrew Moore.
articles.content: The Seattle Mariners, looking to end a postseason drought that stretches to 2001, acquired the best arm on the trade market Friday night in a deal for right-hander Luis Castillo of the Cincinnati Red… [+4934 chars]
